name: Warp Tools
description:
Warp your designs using Smudge, Twirl, Bulge, Pinch, Arc and Free Transform tools. This plugin brings the typical warp tools known from other vector apps to Figma.


See preview here: https://figmawarp.tools


Usage

  • Select the group/frame/layer you want to transform.
  • Run the plugin
  • Transform the design using the tools available.
  • When you’re happy with the result, tap the “Insert” button to place it on the page.


Note

This premium plugin comes as a free trial. You can insert the warped result three times, after that you need to buy the full version to continue using the plugin.
